data.text:
@Mid_Sx_Assembly @jonathanlea The only way I would like to get involved would not be legaly correct & I would need to lose 15 years of my age.
But good luck hope u give them hell

@Mid_Sx_Assembly @jonathanlea I have no kids my friends have kids who are all older enuf to give their consent while parents telling them not too, the adult kids all think their parents are nuts... I tend to just listen..  but any child under 16yo in my opinion belongs to the parents
@jennifercpage @jonathanlea @chrisptaylor Get ready to defend that law.
@BullBreedsNutts @jonathanlea we are looking into this , care to get involved?
@jonathanlea @Mid_Sx_Assembly Had to revisit this who the heck is this death jab squad d.j.s , who would take it upon them self's to take a childs word over the parents wish's ... ffs
@jonathanlea @lulafreedomfyta @Mid_Sx_Assembly Loool not surprised, no one will take responsibility about the shots, they'll say it's your choice to let the kids have it ....
@jonathanlea @lulafreedomfyta @Mid_Sx_Assembly S.a.i.s take legal action against the s.a.i.s
@jennifercpage @jonathanlea @Mid_Sx_Assembly This was my belief when they first started making excuses. Although I’m no lawyer, it’s not hard to see how they remain responsible.

@jonathanlea @chrisptaylor @Mid_Sx_Assembly The school is in loco parentis to every child while on school property so is responsible for any action taking place on that property involving any child. That is the law. No exceptions.
@jonathanlea @JamesHesp @Mid_Sx_Assembly I was only doing as I was ordered
